page.title: 15Industry
page.content: There are many small industries in Mochdre.There is the{Northern Dairies plant where milk is brought in from the farms in milk tankers each day and put into bottles and cartons.The Dairy produces seven thousand crates a day(each of which carries twenty bottles).They also produce three thousand pint cartons and one thousand one-third cartons as well as other sizes.The tankers arrive at Mochdre where the milk is tested and the tankers weighed at a weigh-bridge. The milk then goes into the Dairy to be processed.The Dairy can fill up to four hundred bottles in a minute.
